actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the completion of planning and advance engineering and design of the Harbor Island Project, Texas, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the completiion of planning and advance engineering and design of the Harbor Island project, Texas. Makes provisions for the funding of such project planning.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the completion of planning and advance engineering and design of the Harbor Island Project, Texas, and for other purposes.
